pages.text: Increases the duration of spell effects by 30%. Affects:$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_redemption)Path of Redemption$(/l)$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_the_equinox)Path of the Equinox $()

pages.mod_text: Your scepters spells persist much longer than usual. Manifests on the Bardic Scepter or the Scepter of the Paladin. Persists on the Path of Redemption or the Path of the Aegis.
